data.text: Monna Awurade ase ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ,
Momma Israel nka sɛ,
Momma Aaron fie nka sɛ,
Momma wɔn a wɔsuro Awurade nka sɛ,
Mʼahohiahia mu, mesu frɛɛ Awurade;
Awurade ne me ɔboafoɔ; enti merensuro.
Awurade ne me wɔ hɔ; ɔyɛ me ɔboafoɔ.
Ɛyɛ sɛ yɛbɛhinta wɔ Awurade mu
Ɛyɛ sɛ yɛbɛhinta Awurade mu
Amanaman no nyinaa twaa me ho hyiaaɛ,
Wɔtwaa me ho hyiaeɛ wɔ baabiara,
Wɔkyere guu me so sɛ nwowa,
Wɔsum me kɔɔ mʼakyi a anka mereyɛ ahwe ase,
Awurade yɛ mʼahoɔden ne me dwom;
Osebɔ ne nkonimdie
Wɔapagya Awurade nsa nifa so;
Merenwu, mmom mɛtena ase
Awurade atwe mʼaso denden,
Bue tenenee apono ma me;
Awurade ɛpono nie;
Mɛda wo ase ɛfiri sɛ wogyee me so;
Ɔboɔ a adansifoɔ no poeɛ no,
Awurade na ayɛ yei,
Ɛnnɛ yɛ ɛda a Awurade ayɛ.
Ao Awurade, gye yɛn nkwa;
Nhyira ne deɛ ɔnam Awurade din mu reba.
Awurade yɛ Onyankopɔn,
Woyɛ me Onyankopɔn, na meda wo ase;
Monna Awurade ase, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ;
